property.name: Text
property.value: θ Spend 2 resources: You get +1 έ until the end of the phase. θ Spend 2 resources: You get +1 ή until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fight. You may use ά instead of ή for this attack. When you initiate this attack, search the chaos bag for up to 3 [Bless] tokens and seal them here. For each [Bless] token sealed on Radiant Smite, you get +1 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack. If this attack defeats the attacked enemy, return the sealed tokens to the token pool. Otherwise, release them.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you are not engaged with an enemy.Move. Choose an unrevealed location. Move (one location at a time) along the shortest path toward that location, until you enter that location. End this effect if you reveal a location, if an enemy engages you, or if your movement is blocked.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal 7 random chaos tokens from the chaos bag. Deal a total of 1 damage plus 1 additional damage for each [Curse] or ζ token revealed, divided as you choose among enemies at your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After Priest of Two Faiths enters play: Add 3 [Bless] tokens to the chaos bag.Forced – At the end of the upkeep phase: You must either add 1 [Curse] token to the chaos bag or discard Priest of Two Faiths.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your location. Limit 1 per location. Forced – After a non-Elite enemy enters attached location, discard Under Surveillance: Automatically evade that enemy and discover 1 clue at attached location. That enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Add 1 doom to Blood Pact: You get +2 ά for this skill test. (Limit once per test.) θ Add 1 doom to Blood Pact: You get +2 ή for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)

property.name: Text
property.value: η Exhaust Abyssal Tome: Fight. You must use either έ or ά for this attack, instead of ή. When you initiate this attack, you may place 1 doom on Abyssal Tome (to a maximum of 3). You get +1 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack for each doom on Abyssal Tome.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play when a chaos token with a symbol is revealed during a skill test at your location (before resolving its effects).You or the performing investigator may either commit a card to this skill test, or return a card they committed to this test to their hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play when a skill test at your location begins. Twice during this test, when an investigator reveals a chaos token, they may cancel it, return it to the chaos bag, and reveal a new chaos token.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal tokens from the chaos bag until you reveal a [Curse], ζ, [Bless], or ε token. If you revealed... —...a [Curse] or ζ token, deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location. —...a [Bless] or ε token, heal 2 damage from an investigator or Ally asset at your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is the number of keys the investigators control. β: –2. If you fail and this is an attack or evasion attempt against a Deep One enemy, that enemy engages you. (If it is already engaged with you, it disengages first, then re-engages you.) γ: –3. If you fail and you are not in a vehicle, take 1 damage. δ: –4. If you fail and your location has a key on it, take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is 1 more than the number of keys the investigators control. β: –3. If this is an attack or evasion attempt against a Deep One enemy, that enemy engages you. (If it is already engaged with you, it disengages first, then re-engages you.) γ: –4. If you are not in a vehicle, take 1 damage. δ: –5. If your location has a key on it, take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to move from one Ocean location to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced – When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn – Fishing Vessel’s location. Hunter. Massive. Retaliate. The Terror of Devil Reef cannot enter Cave locations. The Terror of Devil Reef gets +3π health.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to move from one Ocean location to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced – When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn – Fishing Vessel’s location. Hunter. Massive. Retaliate. The Terror of Devil Reef cannot enter Cave locations. Forced – When The Terror of Devil Reef would be defeated: Instead, remove all damage from it and exhaust it. It cannot ready for the remainder of the round (including the upkeep phase).

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost for you to move from one Ocean location to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced – When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Keys can only be claimed from Y’ha-nthlei locations using the θ ability on those locations. Objective – Find and claim as many of the following keys as you can from Y’ha-nthlei locations (purple, white, and black). If you control all 3 of these keys, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Churning Waters enters play fully flooded (even while it is unrevealed).

property.name: Text
property.value: η If you are in the Fishing Vessel: Resign. Each investigator in the Fishing Vessel resigns. Remove Fishing Vessel from the game. Each resigning investigator places each of their purple, black, or white keys on the current act. All other investigators are left to fend for themselves.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After Lonely Isle is revealed: Put 2 random set-aside Tidal Tunnels into play, each adjacent to Lonely Isle (but not to one another).

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After you reveal Hidden Cove: Put 1 set-aside Tidal Tunnel into play adjacent to Hidden Cove, then put 1 set-aside Unfathomable Depths into play adjacent to that Tidal Tunnel.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After you reveal Waveworn Island: Increase its flood level. Put 1 random set-aside Unfathomable Depths and 2 random set-aside Tidal Tunnels into play, each adjacent to Waveworn Island (but not to one another).

property.name: Text
property.value: η If you control the purple key: Look at the revealed side of any Tidal Tunnels or Unfathomable Depths location in play. (Group limit once per game.) Forced – After you reveal Salt Marshes: Increase its flood level. Put 1 random set-aside Tidal Tunnel into play adjacent to Salt Marshes.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After you reveal Black Reef: Increase its flood level. Put 2 random set-aside Tidal Tunnels into play, each adjacent to Black Reef (but not to one another). Then, put 1 random set-aside Unfathomable Depths into play adjacent to both of those Tidal Tunnels.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After Bootlegger’s Hideaway is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on Bootlegger’s Hideaway without looking at it. η If you control the white key: Draw 3 cards. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After Bootlegger’s Hideaway is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on Bootlegger’s Hideaway without looking at it. η If you control the black key: Gain 5 resources. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After this location is revealed: Increase its flood level. Place the set-aside purple key on it. θ If investigators at this location control both the red key and the blue key and spend 2π clues, as a group: Take control of the purple key and read Flashback IX in the Campaign Guide.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After this location is revealed: Increase its flood level. Place the set-aside purple key on it. θ If investigators at this location control both the green key and the yellow key and spend 3π clues, as a group: Take control of the purple key and read Flashback IX in the Campaign Guide.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After this location is revealed: It becomes fully flooded. Place the set-aside white key on it. θ If investigators at this location control both the red key and the yellow key and spend 2π clues, as a group: Take control of the white key and read Flashback X in the Campaign Guide.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After this location is revealed: It becomes fully flooded. Place the set-aside white key on it. θ If investigators at this location control both the blue key and the green key and spend 3π clues, as a group: Take control of the white key and read Flashback X in the Campaign Guide.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After this location is revealed: Place the set-aside black key on it. θ If investigators at this location control both the red key and the green key and spend 2π clues, as a group: Take control of the black key and read Flashback XI in the Campaign Guide.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After this location is revealed: Place the set-aside black key on it. θ If investigators at this location control both the blue key and the yellow key and spend 3π clues, as a group: Take control of the black key and read Flashback XI in the Campaign Guide.

property.name: Text
property.value: Vehicle. While you are in this vehicle, treat your location as if it were unflooded. η: Move Fishing Vessel to a connecting Ocean location.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After your location’s flood level changes, or after a Deep One enemy spawns at your location, exhaust Waveworn Idol: Immediately take an action as if it were your turn (this action does not count toward the number of actions you can take each turn).

property.name: Text
property.value: θ If your location is flooded, exhaust Awakened Mantle: Move to a connecting location that is also flooded.

property.name: Text
property.value: You get +1 skill value while investigating a flooded location or while attacking or evading an enemy at a flooded location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Forced – After Deep One Predator engages you: Move 1 of your clues or keys to Deep One Predator. Forced – When you defeat or evade Deep One Predator: Take control of all of its clues and keys.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. While Hunting Deep One is engaged with you, you cannot enter vehicles or gain resources. Forced – After Hunting Deep One engages you: If you are not in a vehicle, lose 2 resources. If you are in a vehicle, leave your vehicle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ά (2). If you fail, take 2 horror. This test gets +1 difficulty if your location is flooded (+2 difficulty instead if it is fully flooded).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put Aquatic Ambush into play next to the agenda deck. Forced – When you reveal a chaos token while attacking an enemy at a flooded location: Reveal an additional chaos token. (Max once per test.) Forced – At the end of the round: Discard 1 copy of Aquatic Ambush from play. (Max once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ί (2). If you fail, take 2 damage. This test gets +1 difficulty if your location is flooded (+2 difficulty instead if it is fully flooded).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – If no investigators are in a vehicle, Stowaway gains surge. Otherwise, each investigator in a vehicle must either take 1 damage and 1 horror or leave that vehicle. Each investigator who left a vehicle cannot enter that vehicle for the remainder of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put Dragged Under into play in your threat area. If you are in a vehicle, leave it. You cannot enter vehicles. η: Test ή (3) or ί (3). If you succeed, discard Dragged Under.
